content.metaTitle: Villa Laurel Jávea - €1.975M Luxury Villa with Sea Views
content.metaDescription: Stunning 4-bed villa in Torre Ambolo, Jávea with sea views, 1305m² plot, pool & terraces. Licensed contemporary Mediterranean design. Ready to build.
content.heroIntro:
Discover Villa Laurel, an extraordinary contemporary villa positioned on an exclusive south-facing plot in the prestigious Torre Ambolo area of Jávea. With breathtaking sea views and a coveted Portichol - Balcón al Mar address, this €1,975,000 property represents the pinnacle of Mediterranean luxury living on the Costa Blanca.

This architecturally stunning 4-bedroom, 4-bathroom villa spans 231m² of thoughtfully designed living space across a generous 1305m² plot. With full building license already secured, Villa Laurel combines clean, contemporary lines with traditional Mediterranean charm, creating an indoor-outdoor lifestyle that epitomizes the relaxed elegance of coastal Spanish living.

locationSection.intro:
Torre Ambolo in Jávea represents one of the Costa Blanca's most sought-after residential areas, renowned for its exclusive atmosphere and stunning natural beauty. This elevated location offers panoramic Mediterranean views while maintaining privacy and tranquility, just minutes from Jávea's pristine beaches and vibrant town center. The area is characterized by luxury villas, mature pine forests, and dramatic coastal cliffs.

The Portichol - Balcón al Mar designation places Villa Laurel in an elite enclave where international buyers seek the perfect balance of natural beauty and sophisticated amenities. With excellent connectivity to Alicante airport (90 minutes) and Valencia (90 minutes), this location offers the ideal blend of peaceful retreat and convenient access to major Spanish cities and international travel hubs.
highlights: Exclusive Torre Ambolo location with panoramic Mediterranean sea views
Walking distance to pristine Portichol beach and scenic coastal paths
5 minutes drive to Jávea's historic old town and marina
Premium residential area surrounded by protected natural parkland
Excellent connectivity to international schools and golf courses

propertyFeatures.intro: Villa Laurel showcases contemporary Mediterranean architecture at its finest, with every detail carefully considered to maximize comfort, style, and the spectacular natural setting. The two-floor design optimizes sea views from multiple vantage points while creating distinct zones for relaxation, entertainment, and private retreat.
features: Four spacious bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and sea view potential
Open-plan living area with floor-to-ceiling windows and direct terrace access
Modern kitchen with central island and premium appliance provisions
Private swimming pool as the centerpiece of outdoor living
Expansive terraces and naturally shaded outdoor dining areas
1305m² landscaped plot with Mediterranean garden design
South-facing orientation ensuring optimal natural light throughout
Contemporary architecture blending seamlessly with coastal landscape
Multiple outdoor entertaining spaces including panoramic terraces
Private parking and secure entrance with established developer reputation

content.investmentSection:
Villa Laurel represents an exceptional investment opportunity in one of Spain's most stable and desirable property markets. Jávea's luxury villa market has demonstrated consistent growth, with properties in Torre Ambolo commanding premium values due to limited availability and consistently high demand from international buyers. The combination of sea views, generous plot size, and prestigious location ensures strong capital appreciation potential.

The Costa Blanca's established rental market provides excellent income potential, with luxury villas like Villa Laurel achieving premium weekly rates during peak seasons. The area's year-round appeal, driven by excellent climate, world-class amenities, and strong international community, ensures consistent demand from both holiday rental guests and long-term tenants. With Spanish property market fundamentals remaining strong and international buyer interest in Mediterranean coastal properties continuing to grow, Villa Laurel offers both lifestyle and financial rewards.
whyBuySection: Exclusive Torre Ambolo location with guaranteed sea views and premium neighborhood prestige
Ready-to-build project with full license secured, eliminating planning uncertainties
Generous 1305m² plot providing privacy, landscaping potential, and future expansion options
Contemporary Mediterranean design by respected developer Miralbo Urbana
Prime Costa Blanca location with excellent rental yield potential and capital growth prospects
South-facing orientation ensuring optimal natural light and energy efficiency
Walking distance to pristine beaches while maintaining elevated privacy and tranquility

faqs.question: What is the total price and are payment plans available?
faqs.answer: Villa Laurel is priced at €1,975,000. Payment terms can be discussed directly with the developer, and we can arrange mortgage financing through our Habeno partnership to suit your requirements.

faqs.question: When will Villa Laurel be completed?
faqs.answer: The villa has full building license secured and construction timeline will be confirmed upon contract signing. Typical build time for this type of project is 12-18 months from commencement.

faqs.question: What's included in the purchase price?
faqs.answer: The price includes the 1305m² plot, full architectural project, building license, swimming pool, landscaped gardens, and high-quality finishes as specified in the technical specifications.

faqs.question: Can I arrange a mortgage for this property?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work with Habeno to provide competitive mortgage solutions for international buyers. Spanish banks typically offer up to 70% financing for non-residents purchasing luxury properties.

faqs.question: What is the rental potential for Villa Laurel?
faqs.answer: Luxury villas in Torre Ambolo with sea views achieve excellent rental yields. Weekly rates can range from €3,000-€6,000+ during peak season, with strong bookings year-round due to the prestigious location.

faqs.question: How do I arrange a viewing of the plot and project?
faqs.answer: Contact us via WhatsApp or phone to arrange a site visit. We can show you the exclusive plot location, architectural plans, and discuss the full project in detail.

faqs.question: What makes Torre Ambolo location special?
faqs.answer: Torre Ambolo is Jávea's most exclusive residential area, offering unparalleled sea views, privacy, proximity to pristine beaches, and a sophisticated international community in a protected natural setting.

faqs.question: What is the buying process for international purchasers?
faqs.answer: We guide international buyers through every step: NIE number acquisition, legal representation, deposit and contract signing, mortgage arrangement if required, and completion. The process typically takes 8-12 weeks.

faqs.question: Are there any additional costs beyond the purchase price?
faqs.answer: Additional costs include transfer tax (6-10%), legal fees (1-1.5%), notary and registration fees (~1%), and connection of utilities. We provide a detailed cost breakdown during the initial consultation.

content.conclusion: Villa Laurel represents an unparalleled opportunity to secure a luxury Mediterranean lifestyle in one of Costa Blanca's most prestigious locations. With full license secured and a reputation developer behind the project, this is your chance to own a contemporary masterpiece with guaranteed sea views in Torre Ambolo. Contact us today via WhatsApp (+34 634 044 970) to arrange your private viewing and begin your journey to Costa Blanca luxury living.
